nodes.text: Noan Jeraddi was a captain in the Alliance to Restore the Republic who served in the Tatooine Patrol.

Sometime during the Galactic Civil War, the Tatooine Patrol discovered Slave I, the personally starship of Boba Fett, abandoned in geosynchronous orbit of the planet Tatooine. Captain Noan Jeraddi, with Lieutenant Tepra Tseelit, wrote Incident Report 39:3:22 detailing what happened to Slave I and the blast-proof strongbox found in the cockpit.
